movie.title: Sleepy Hollow
movie.writer: Washington Irving (story), Kevin Yagher (screen story), Andrew Kevin Walker (screen story), Andrew Kevin Walker (screenplay)
movie.actors: Johnny Depp, Christina Ricci, Miranda Richardson, Michael Gambon
movie.plot: The curse of the headless horseman is the legacy of the small town of Sleepy Hollow. Spearheaded by the eager Constable Ichabod Crane and his new world ways into the quagmire of secrets and murder, secrets once laid to rest, best forgotten and now reawakened, and he too, holding a dark secret of a past once gone.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Sleepy Hollow entertains with its stunning visuals and creepy atmosphere.
